description: Complete feature registry for Narrato v4.0 autonomous development

authentication.name: Authentication System
authentication.description: Complete user authentication with registration, login, logout, password reset, and secure session management
acceptanceCriteria: User can register with email and password validation
User can login with secure session persistence
User can logout with complete session cleanup
Password reset works with secure email verification
All forms are WCAG 2.1 AA compliant
testRequirements: Unit tests for authentication store and validation
E2E tests for complete authentication workflows

settings-system.name: Settings System
settings-system.description: Core settings infrastructure with persistence, validation, import/export, and real-time updates
acceptanceCriteria: Settings persist across browser sessions
Settings can be reset to defaults with confirmation
Settings can be exported/imported as JSON
Settings validation prevents invalid values
Settings interface is fully accessible
testRequirements: Unit tests for settings store and validation

book-library.name: Book Library Management
book-library.description: Complete book library with grid/list views, search, filtering, sorting, and book management operations
acceptanceCriteria: Books display in grid, list, and compact views
Search works by title, author, and tags with real-time results
Filtering by status, favorites, and date range
Sorting by title, author, date added, and last read
Book management operations work offline
testRequirements: Unit tests for library store and search logic
Integration tests for library UI interactions
E2E tests for complete library workflows

basic-reader.name: Basic Reader Interface
basic-reader.description: Core reading interface with chapter navigation, responsive design, and accessibility features
acceptanceCriteria: Chapter content displays with proper formatting
Navigation works with buttons and keyboard shortcuts
Reader interface is fully responsive and mobile-optimized
60fps scrolling performance on mobile devices
Complete accessibility with screen reader support
testRequirements: Unit tests for reader store and navigation
Integration tests for reader UI and chapter loading
Performance tests for scrolling and rendering
E2E tests for complete reading workflows

parser-management.name: Parser Management System
parser-management.description: Extensible parser system with support for Royal Road, ReadNovelFull, FreeWebNovel, FanMTL, and generic parsing
acceptanceCriteria: Parsers for all major web novel sites work correctly
Parser system is extensible for new sites
Parser management UI allows enable/disable
Generic parser provides fallback for unsupported sites
Parser errors are handled gracefully with user feedback
testRequirements: Mock tests for external site parsing
Error handling tests for network failures

book-import.name: Book Import System
book-import.description: Comprehensive book import with progress tracking, queue management, error handling, and retry functionality
acceptanceCriteria: Books can be imported from supported URLs
Import progress shows with visual feedback
Failed imports can be retried with clear error messages
Multiple imports can be queued and processed
Import interface is accessible with progress announcements
testRequirements: Unit tests for import store and job management
Error handling tests for various failure scenarios
E2E tests for complete import processes

position-tracking.name: Position Tracking - Innovation Challenge
position-tracking.description: Revolutionary position tracking system achieving 95%+ accuracy with zero position loss - complete reimagination of current approach
acceptanceCriteria: Position restoration achieves 95%+ accuracy across all content types
Zero position loss occurs during any usage scenario including inactivity
Position tracking has minimal performance impact (<1% CPU, <5MB memory)
System works reliably offline and syncs when online
Users never notice position tracking working but always return to exact position
testRequirements: Innovation validation tests proving superiority over current implementation
Accuracy tests achieving 95%+ across all content types and scenarios
Performance tests validating minimal impact on reading experience
Reliability tests ensuring zero position loss in all usage patterns

reading-customization.name: Reading Customization System
reading-customization.description: Comprehensive reading customization with fonts, themes, layout, spacing, and real-time preview
acceptanceCriteria: Font family, size, and spacing can be customized
Multiple themes (light, dark, sepia, high-contrast) available
Layout and alignment options work correctly
Customizations apply instantly with real-time preview
Customization interface is fully accessible
testRequirements: Unit tests for customization store and validation
Visual regression tests for theme changes

search-discovery.name: Advanced Search and Discovery
search-discovery.description: Powerful search with fuzzy matching, boolean operators, saved searches, and advanced filtering
acceptanceCriteria: Search handles typos with fuzzy matching

Search results are ranked by relevance

text-to-speech.name: Text-to-Speech System
text-to-speech.description: Comprehensive TTS with Web Speech API, voice selection, audio controls, and position synchronization
acceptanceCriteria: TTS works with Web Speech API
Voice selection from available system voices
Audio controls (play, pause, stop, rate, pitch, volume)

audio-sync.name: Audio Position Synchronization
audio-sync.description: Advanced audio-text synchronization with highlighting, position mapping, and accuracy tracking

voice-selection.description: Comprehensive voice selection with preview, favorites, and voice quality indicators
